title: Episode 291: Lizzo
description: “Still Bad” LISTEN: APPLE · SPOTIFY · AMAZON · OTHER APPS Lizzo is a Grammy- and Emmy-winning singer, rapper, songwriter, and actress. She’s been putting out music since 2013, and her last two albums both went platinum. Her fifth album, Love In Real Life, comes out this summer. author: Tiger Biskup

title: Episode 290: MJ Lenderman

title: Rock & Roll Hall of Fame’s 2025 Class: The White Stripes, OutKast, Soundgarden & More
description: Cyndi Lauper, Joe Cocker, Bad Company, Chubby Checker, and Warren Zevon will also be enshrined during the November 8th ceremony. Rock & Roll Hall of Fame’s 2025 Class: The White Stripes, OutKast, Soundgarden & More Scoop Harrison

title: Phish Snubbed by Rock & Roll Hall of Fame Despite Winning Fan Vote
description: The band won nearly 50,000 more fan votes than any other artist, but will not be enshrined this year. Phish Snubbed by Rock & Roll Hall of Fame Despite Winning Fan Vote Jo Vito
author: Jo Vito

title: Sammy Virji and Issey Cross Create Dancefloor Catharsis With New Single, "Nostalgia"
description: Like its title suggests, "Nostalgia" is equal parts fun and wistful, an energetic rush of UK garage laced with tinctures of melancholy.
author: Brooke Bierman

title: Flume and JPEGMAFIA Reunite for Animated Music Video Ahead of New EP, "We Live In A Society"
description: Flume's first new music in over two years arrives by way of a zany, seven-minute animated video featuring glitched-out hip-hop and experimental trap beats.

title: Kehlani Responds to Removal from Cornell University Performance
description: “I am not antisemitic, nor anti-Jew. I am anti-genocide,” Kehlani said in an Instagram video, after being dropped from the lineup of the university’s annual spring concert due to her opposition of Israel’s war in Gaza
